meanings.definition: (verb) to make a vibrant or buzzing sound, like that of a cricket
meanings.sent1: The tiny cricket would chirr loudly in the grass.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the chirring of insects in the warm summer night.
meanings.sent3: The chirring of the cricket interrupted the quiet picnic.
meanings.sent4: The chirring of the insects filled the air with life.
meanings.sent5: The chirring sound of the cricket was a symphony in the garden.

meanings.definition: (noun) a vibrant or buzzing sound, like that of a cricket
meanings.sent1: The chirr of the cricket was a soothing melody in the evening.
meanings.sent2: We could hear the chirr of insects as we walked through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The constant chirr of the crickets made it hard to fall asleep.
meanings.sent4: The chirr of the insects was like a lullaby in the night.
meanings.sent5: The chirr of the cricket was a familiar sound of summer evenings.
